channel.title: GNU/Linux on Ayamir's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in GNU/Linux on Ayamir's Blog

item.title: How to Fix GPGME Error on Archlinux
item.description: Delete old sync files sudo rm /var/lib/pacman/sync/* Re init pacman-key sudo pacman-key --init Populate key sudo pacman-key --populate Re sync sudo pacman -Syyy Now you can update successfully!
